resources.string:
1) Way of Use 

1.1) This application is a driven by voice "todo list" allowing to create new text events from your voice and if wanted synchronise them with your favorite calendar app (see Menu). 

1.2) To use, you select a date = or > to the current date, you choose a time and you can record your event. 

2) Calendar Screen. 

2.1) current date without event : blue and red 

2.2) current date with event : dark blue 

2.3) date with event > current date : light blue 

2.4) date with event < current date : yellow 

2.5) click on date with event : displaying of events list screen for the date. 

2.6) click on date without event = ou > current date : you start a new event recording session. 

3) Events List Screen. 

3.1) list of a date = or > current date : You may click an event to modify or suppress it. 

3.2) list of a date = or > current date : You may record a new event for the date. 

3.3) list of a date < current date : You may click an event to suppress it. 

4) Event Updating Screen. 

4.1) You may modify the time AND the text of the event. 

5) Menu. 

5.1) You may delete all the events < to a selected date. 

5.2) You may synchronised your new created event with your favorite calendar app.
The time must be > to the current time
Click \'OK\' to record a new event
Sorry, your smartphone isn\'t fit for voice recording...
Date and time of the event\n
Modify time and/or text of event of\n
You can\'t select a date \u003C to current date
BEWARE you are going to suppress all the events \u003C to\u0020
choose a date \u003C or = to the current date
all the events \u003C to the selected date shall be deleted
